title: Graph - current due to changing mag flux

content.prompt: A loop of wire is entering a region that contains a magnetic field of magnitude B with an initial speed of v, as shown in the figure. The graph shows the magnitude of the electric field created in the loop as the loop enters the field. The electric field creates a counterclockwise current in the loop. Which of the following indicates how the loop is moving as it enters the field and the direction of the magnetic field?

choices.label: The loop is moving at a constant speed, and the magnetic field is into the page.
The loop is moving at a constant speed, and the magnetic field is out of the page.
The loop is speeding up, and the magnetic field is into the page.
The loop is speeding up, and the magnetic field is out of the page.
The loop is slowing down, and the magnetic field is into the page.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
